p: The air-dried flower heads of C. morifolium and C. indicum were hydro- distillated by Clevenger-type apparatus (Faculty of Bioscience, Heidelberg University glassware Lab, Heidelberg, Germany) for 6 h. Dehydrated essential oils (EO) were obtained by using anhydrous Na 2SO 4 to yield 0.16% and 0.18% dry weight, respectively. The essential oils were stored in amber glass with stopper vials at −30 °C until analysis.
